titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding the use of content labeling for Internet web sites of Members of the House of Representatives.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 5/23/2002--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that each Member of the House should provide for the labeling of the content of the Member's Internet web site in a manner consistent with the labeling system utilized by the Internet Content Rating Association (ICRA) and other recognized voluntary Internet content filtering organizations.
